name: Bosburymock
culture_notes: Riveric Dialect dominant with Coastal Tongue loanwords
diet centered on smoked fish and riverweed stews
annual tide-blessing festival before navigation season
custom of offering small coin to ferry spirits
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
no instant resurrection or true life-replacement magics allowed
long-range mind-influence is rare and institutionally banned
notes: near-medieval to early-industrial baseline with localized ritual practices
strategic small river crossing often contested by itinerant bands
